title: New: EVAN – Blowing Smoke
body:
Damn.

Music doesn’t get any more raw than this track from London artist **EVAN**, yet by the same merit, it’s vulnerability and underproduced vibe is partially why it’s so moving. Entirely acoustic, _Blowing Smoke_ harks back to early **Conor Oberst** lyrically, and even tinges of **Nick Drake** amongst the honest poetry. ‘_if my dad could only see, how lonesome I could be, he’d say “it’s not the loneliness that kills, it’s the never ever really living free_“‘ may well be the most heartwarming, emotive line of 2012 thus far.
